channel.title: The Beatles Anthology Revisited
channel.itunes:author: Unknown
channel.description: Put together anonymously by a clearly devoted Fab Four fan, The Beatles Anthology Revisited is an 18-part, 28-hour podcast telling the band's story entirely in their own words, those who were there, and various TV and radio newsreels of the time. There are also Beatles tunes, of course, most released, some buried treasures. It's both exhilarating and exhausting, but, if you take a break every four or five hours, your life will finally have meaning. Bottom line, it's everything you ever wanted to know about The Beatles, and a little bit more...

item.title: 1992-12-12 - Coast to Coast AM with Art Bell - Area 51 - John Lear - Bob Lazar.mp3
